oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modelling Demand for Organic Products – Implications for the Questionnaire
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Lars Gårn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This working paper is a preliminary discussion of the type of information we seek to capture with the questionnaire, how we hope to use this information and how questions eliciting information could be formulated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hansen, Lars Gårn (2001) Modelling Demand for Organic Products – Implications for the Questionnaire. Working paper.
